Trustee_14.name: Juan Carlos Reyes
Trustee_14.content: During this investment process, I demonstrated strong adherence to the agreed-upon allocation plan by correctly distributing 30% of the profits to myself and 70% to the investor. This commitment to fair profit-sharing has enhanced my reputation as a trustworthy and competent trustee. I prioritize clear communication and compliance with established norms, which positively reflects my reliability and pro-social behavior. My willingness to deliver results further underscores my competence in managing investments effectively.

Investor_6.name: Sergey Petrov
Investor_6.content: As a newcomer to investment activities, Sergey exhibited a positive attitude by engaging in this transaction and trusting the allocation plan presented to him. His willingness to participate indicates openness to collaboration and a potential for building a positive reputation within the investment community. I view his readiness to engage favorably, suggesting that with continued involvement, he may develop a strong, trustworthy presence.
